mapper.insert: insert INTO t_r_inspect_day(orgcode,category,num,fee,date) select t1.orgcode,t1.category, count(*) as num, sum(t1.fee) as fee, DATE_FORMAT(t1.createat,'%Y-%m-%d') as date from t_b_inspect t1 where t1.orgcode = #{orgCode} AND t1.createat BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY category
